About.title: About me
About.lead: I bring initiative, structure and real project execution — the exact mix teams need in an Ausbildung context.
paragraphs: My path into development started with curiosity: I wanted to understand how strong digital products are built and why some interfaces feel intuitive from the first second.
To improve fast, I built a disciplined learning routine with daily coding sprints, clear documentation and consistent quality checks for build stability, performance and accessibility.

Today I can deliver complete frontend features end-to-end: from concept to responsive UI and maintainable TypeScript architecture. For 2026, I am looking for an Ausbildung team where I can turn this practice into professional product work.
